content.description: The graph shows the velocity <math alttext="v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>v</mi></math> of a cart as a function of time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math>, where the positive direction is to the right. Which of the following correctly indicates the direction of the momentum of the cart during the two time intervals shown?
content.question: <math alttext="0 is less than t, which is less than t sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0</mn><mo><</mo><mi>t</mi><mo><</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math><math alttext="t sub 1 is less than t, which is less than t sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo><</mo><mi>t</mi><mo><</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>ATo the leftTo the leftBTo the leftTo the rightCTo the rightTo the leftDTo the rightTo the right

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
